**Task priority**
The priority of the task [HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW]

# Task description
A clear and concise description of task assigned

**Person assigned**
Task assigned to [...]

# Must Haves
Things that **have** to be there in the library.

## Extras
Things that must be worked on after the _must haves_ are finished.
